title: Function Concepts-Tabular and Analytical: Rational, Part B

content.question: Part B (i) Find all values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math>, as decimal approximations, for which <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 5"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>, or indicate that there are no such values. (ii) Determine the end behavior of <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> as <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> increases without bound. Express your answer using the mathematical notation of a limit.

frqParts.text: Part B (i) Find all values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math>, as decimal approximations, for which <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 5"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>, or indicate that there are no such values. (ii) Determine the end behavior of <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> as <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> increases without bound. Express your answer using the mathematical notation of a limit.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
